messages.content: Nicky Shepard has been selected as the Liberal Democrat candidate to fight for North East Herts on Thursday 8th June. Nicky Shepard and the Liberal Democrats are providing the only opposition to the Conservatives' damaging Hard Brexit plans.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.
The Liberal Democrats have pledged £6 billion a year to rebuild the NHS we all depend on.
North East Herts schools are set to lose more than £6 million under Conservative plans.

mentions.partyLeader: Like every County Councillor, Steve Jarvis

issues.brexitEurope: A disastrous hard Brexit will hit people in the poorest areas of the country, with the poorest families hit hardest. We need to protect jobs, by keeping us in the single market and reject the hard Brexit of the Conservatives.
issues.economy: We need to protect jobs, by keeping us in the single market and reject the hard Brexit of the Conservatives.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats have pledged £6 billion a year to rebuild the NHS we all depend on.
issues.transport: Roughly £60,000 of the roads budget is already committed for this year (this has to be decided months in advance so the remaining can be allocated). The money can go towards road resurfacing, pavement repairs, drains, hedges, and white line painting.

community.content: Like every County Councillor, Steve Jarvis has a small budget to spend on works on local roads and pavements as well as to spend on supporting community groups or local activities.

politicalExperience.role: Local Lib Dem campaigner Steve Jarvis was elected as County councillor for the new Royston West and Rural seat.

quotes.text: "I would like to thank all those who supported me in the election. I am now working to improve what the County Council does for all the residents of the area."

images.caption: Nicky Shepard and the Liberal Democrats are providing the only opposition to the Conservatives' damaging Hard Brexit plans.
